ValidationRule.description: Requires Closure Reason if a "Closed" status is selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Closure_Reason__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed_Suspended"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Revoked"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Denied"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Inactive"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Withdrawn"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Rejected") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add a closure reason before closing the Registration.
